CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: A new alternating copolymer ( PSFDTBT ) based on spirobifluorene , thiophene , and benzothiadiazole units has been synthesized.

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PSFDTBT |
| spirobifluorene |
| thiophene |
| benzothiadiazole |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Sure, here's the updated table with the valid entities:

| Material Name |
| --- |
| PSFDTBT |
| spirobifluorene |
| thiophene |

I removed "benzothiadiazole" from the list as it does not clearly refer to a material name. It is a chemical compound that is used as a building block in the synthesis of the material, but it is not the name of the material itself.

These three entities are all materials or chemical compounds that are used in the synthesis of the new alternating copolymer (PSFDTBT) mentioned in the paragraph.
